Name: :math:`V_\text{SPIL}^{t,~b}`
Description: Spilled water volumes when basins are full

Name: :math:`S_\text{BAS}^{t,~b,~s_b}`
Description: The state of a basin derived from its volume:  :math:`S_\text{BAS}^{t, b, s_b} = \begin{cases} 1 \text{ if } V_\text{BAS}^{t, b} \in  \left[ V_\text{BAS, MIN}^{b,~s_b} ;V_\text{BAS, MAX}^{b,~s_b} \right] \\ 0 \text{ otherwise} \end{cases}`

Name: :math:`P_\text{TUR}^{t,~h}`
Description: Electrical power produced by a turbine

Name: :math:`Q_\text{TUR}^{t,~h}`
Description: Amount of water that flows through a turbine

Name: :math:`P_\text{PUM}^{t,~h}`
Description: Electrical power produced by a pump

Name: :math:`Q_\text{PUM}^{t,~h}`
Description: Amount of water that flows through a pump

Name: :math:`Q_\text{TUR, S}^{t,~h,~s_h}`
Description: Amount of water that flows through a turbine for each hydro powerplant state

Name: :math:`Q_\text{PUM, S}^{t,~h,~s_h}`
Description: Amount of water that flows through a pump for each hydro powerplant state
